# .NET build folders
bin/
obj/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/

# Rider / JetBrains
.idea/

# Logs
*.log

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Docker
*.pid
*.env

# Database files
*.mdf
*.ldf
*.ndf
*.sqlite
*.db

# ASP.NET secrets or config overrides
appsettings.Development.json
secrets.json

# Publish output
publish/
dist/

# Node modules
node_modules/

# Optional: ignore test coverage reports
coverage/
*.coverage
*.coveragexml

# Ignore npm
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
